name: CUBICAL (ShinPJDev)
description:
Cubical is a game about a cube trying to escape from his job and that's it! First game I have published so don't expect anything crazy here lol. This was more so learning for me than an actual product but if you want to give it a shot then go feel free to do so!

W - Moves character forward

A - Moves character left

S - Moves character down

D - Moves character right
